description: Try our easy to follow Blackberry Yoghurt Iceblocks With Macadamia Sprinkles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Ice blocks,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Vegetarian,Egg free,Quick & easy dessert
name: Blackberry Yoghurt Iceblocks With Macadamia Sprinkles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Process 1 cups yoghurt, blackberries, juice and syrup in a food processor until smooth. Pour mixture evenly among 8 x 1/3-cup iceblock moulds. Insert sticks and freeze overnight or until firm.
Process nuts in a food processor until finely chopped.

To serve, dip moulds briefly in hot water to loosen and carefully remove iceblocks. Spread top portion of each block with about 2 tsp remaining yoghurt. Coat with nuts. Lay on a tray and refreeze for 10 minutes.
